snippet: The police have arrested 802 people on suspicion of child trafficking and have rescued 181 children in a major operation spanning 15 provinces.
abstract: Police in China arrest 802 people on suspicion of child trafficking and rescue 181 children in a major operation spanning 15 provinces; China's strict one-child policy has driven a thriving market in babies, especially boys.
lead_paragraph: The police have arrested 802 people on suspicion of child trafficking and have rescued 181 children in a major operation spanning 15 provinces.

headline.main: China: Police Crack Down on Child Trafficking Rings
headline.print_headline: China: Police Crack Down on Child Trafficking Rings
